name: Introspection - Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1
description:
INTROSPECTION is a platformer in which you play as a child lost in what seems to be another dimension and help him find his way out. You will encounter many challenges but also new friends !

And everyone know friends are stronger together !

____________________________________

Credits :
